meanings.definition: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.
meanings.sent1: Her memories of the fun day at the park brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: I cherish the memories of my childhood spent playing with friends.
meanings.sent3: His memories of forgetting his keys every day always made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her grandmother's wisdom were like a guiding light in her life.
meanings.sent5: The memories of the beautiful sunset were etched in her mind forever.

meanings.sent1: The old photo album was filled with cherished memories of family vacations.
meanings.sent2: The memories of her first bike ride without training wheels still made her proud.
meanings.sent3: His memories of wearing mismatched socks to school always made him cringe.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood home were like a warm hug in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The memories of the delicious birthday cake lingered in her mind.

meanings.definition: The state or fact of being remembered.
meanings.sent1: The actor's performance left a lasting memory in the minds of the audience.
meanings.sent2: The memories of her kindness will always be treasured by those she helped.
meanings.sent3: His memories of being the class clown were brought up at every reunion.
meanings.sent4: The memories of their love story were like a beautiful painting on the wall of time.
meanings.sent5: The memories of her bravery in the face of adversity inspired many.
